Text: If possible, it would be great if you could get Mortality by Christopher Hitches ... can't find it anywhere and Amazon is overpricing it. Meanwhile, many thanks for these uploads.

These floods are awesome, thank you!
I also have a request - Beautiful Ruins by Jess Walter.  If you can.  Please and thank you.
could you please get Animal Attraction by Jill Shalvis?  Thanks so much!

Awesome upload, as always!
thanks again, bbs. are you able to get sandra brown's low pressure, or jd robb's delusion in death? they're new releases, i think. thanks.

Have you by any means got Wicked business by Janet Evanovich ?

Hello Sir, I need these books can you help?
1- Spark & Hustle: Launch and Grow Your Small Business Now
2- Fired to Hired: Bouncing Back from Job Loss to Get to Work Right Now
3- Will Work from Home: Earn the Cash--Without the Commute
4- Women for Hire's Get-Ahead Guide to Career Success
5- Take This Book to Work: How to Ask for (and Get) Money, Fulfillment, and Advancement 
6- Women For Hire: The Ultimate Guide to Getting A Job 

All books are by Tory Johnson: http://www.amazon.com/Tory-Johnson/e/B001IXU62A/ref=ntt_athr_dp_pel_pop_1
Thanks in advance!
Great Torrent as always!  Do you think you could get books by Milly Johnson and Claudia Carrol?  Thanks!

Great stuff!
Any chance of getting George C. Chesbro's Mongo series? There's a couple of torrent out there with 6 of his books...but no seeders anymore.

Great work though!
